trans-unit.source: Provides a <xref href="System.Windows.WeakEventManager"></xref> implementation so that you can use the weak event listener pattern to attach listeners for the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.INotifyDataErrorInfo.ErrorsChanged"></xref> event.
Adds the specified event handler, which is called when specified source raises the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.INotifyDataErrorInfo.ErrorsChanged"></xref> event.
The source object that raises the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.INotifyDataErrorInfo.ErrorsChanged"></xref> event.
The delegate that handles the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.INotifyDataErrorInfo.ErrorsChanged"></xref> event.
Returns a new object to contain listeners to the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.INotifyDataErrorInfo.ErrorsChanged"></xref> event.
A new object to contain listeners to the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.INotifyDataErrorInfo.ErrorsChanged"></xref> event.
Removes the specified event handler from the specified source.
The source object that raises the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.INotifyDataErrorInfo.ErrorsChanged"></xref> event.
The delegate that handles the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.INotifyDataErrorInfo.ErrorsChanged"></xref> event.
Begins listening for the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.INotifyDataErrorInfo.ErrorsChanged"></xref> event on the specified source.
The source object that raises the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.INotifyDataErrorInfo.ErrorsChanged"></xref> event.
Stops listening for the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.INotifyDataErrorInfo.ErrorsChanged"></xref> event on the specified source.
The source object that raises the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.INotifyDataErrorInfo.ErrorsChanged"></xref> event.
